title: Reforming and banning
body: So if I get a two weeks Ban and I manage to get reformed by not being toxic and getting a Honor level .will I get a Permabanned, If I get a ban(after the two weeks ban) because a team decided to report me because they're trolling.

replies.body:
>  If I get a ban(after the two weeks ban) because a team decided to report me because they're trolling.

This cant happen. You only get punished for things *you* do, and number of reports dont count against you in any way.

It takes a long time to be considered reformed by the system, and over an even longer period of time you may drop a punishment/warning tier.

Note that this is not an "allowed misbehaviors per year" system, it is a warning that you need to shape up or ship out, and you probably will be permbanned next time regardless.

Honor level is irrelevant to penalty tiers.
It all depends how many people report you over the number of games you play. It takes a very large amount of games as well as not receiving reports from those games before you can move down a penalty. If you're negative, toxic, or being inflammatory, your next penalty will be a permaban.

But honor has NOTHING to do with penalties. You can be honor 5 and still get banned.
